patches.title: Balance Post –  Season 1 Begins!
patches.summary: Summary of the patch with key highlights.

Vanguard.name: Captain America
changes: Reduce the delay time for shield restoration after releasing Living Legend from 3s to 2s.
Reduce Liberty Rush cooldown from 12s to 10s.
Reduce the energy cost for releasing Freedom Charge (ultimate ability) from 3400 to 3100; Reduce the additional health provided per second to self after releasing it from 110 to 100.

Vanguard.name: Doctor Strange
changes: Add damage falloff to Maelstrom of Madness and Gamma Maelstrom. Starting at 5 meters and reducing to 70% at 8 meters.
Slightly decrease the shield value recovery rate after releasing Shield of the Seraphim from 80/s to 70/s.

Duelist.name: Black Panther
changes: Reduce the additional health provided to self after refreshing Vibranium Marks with Spirit Rend from 40 to 30, and the upper limit of additional health provided from 120 to 75.
Reduce Hawkeye's season bonus from 20% to 15%.
Reduce Hela's season bonus from 20% to 15%.

patches.title: Marvel Rivals Patch Notes
patches.summary: Rivals, Assemble! As the light fades and the eternal night falls, Dracula and his undead legion have seized control of New York City. Before we embark on the epic battle to banish the darkness and restore the light, dive into the thrilling details of this update!

content.title: Heroes and Costumes
details: Mister Fantastic and the Invisible Woman join Marvel Rivals!
New Costumes: Mister Fantastic - The Maker; Invisible Woman - Malice!

content.title: Maps and Modes
details: Explore the new Convoy map - Empire of Eternal Night: Midtown.
Prepare for the thrilling arcade mode (Doom Match) and its map (Sanctum Sanctorum): 8-12 players will engage in battle, with the top 50% emerging victorious.
New feature: In Convoy and Convergence, both sides can transition to the next spawn room sometime after the attacking side completes the current target.
Enhanced feature: During the loading phase of a Quick Match, you can now view the Nameplates of both sides.

content.title: Season & Store
details: Unlock a dazzling shiny new Battle Pass featuring 10 brand new sets of heroic costumes!
Embark on the first thrilling half of the Midnight Features Season Event!
Dive into the latest Twitch Drops event, featuring rewards such as the Hela - Will of Galacta costume. (Stay tuned for official announcements for specific times)

We have revised the refresh times for various in-game content. Beginning with Season 1, the unlock time for daily missions, the availability of new items in the store, and the start time for most events have been adjusted from 7:00 (UTC+0) to 9:00 (UTC+0).
Additionally, we have optimized the mission types and removed some of the more challenging ones.

content.title: General
details: Resolved numerous issues related to notifications.
Rectified various text errors.

content.title: Heroes
details: Corrected minor movement ability discrepancies for certain heroes (like Doctor Strange and Magik) at both low and high frame rates.
Addressed occasional malfunctions with, or inability to use Wolverine's team-up ability.

patches.title: Marvel Rivals Patch Notes
patches.summary: Greetings, Rivals! We're here to give you the scoop on Version 20241210's updates!

content.title: General
details: When playing highlights and recordings, crosshair deviation would be significant, and there was a possibility for lag. This issue has been resolved.
Changing where Highlights were saved would cause the game to crash. This issue has been resolved.
Players joining a Quick Match as a replacement may not be able to see heroes' equipped costumes. This issue has been resolved.
Mission progress on the Season Event screen would not display correctly. This issue has been resolved.
Fixed some textual errors. More fixes will be coming in a future update.

content.title: Maps & Game Modes
details: Special collisions on certain maps caused the player's character to become stuck or clip through and enter strange areas. These issues have been largely resolved.

patches.title: Marvel Rivals Winter Celebration Patch Notes
patches.summary: Dear Rivals: Get ready to embrace the chill and welcome the holiday season with the first Special Event of Marvel Rivals!

content.title: Dive into the frosty festivities
details: Join the fun and earn the Jeff the Land Shark - Cuddly Fuzzlefin series costume rewards completely for FREE!

content.title: Winter? Snow? It's Jeff!
details: Take control of Jeff the Land Shark and spray snowflakes to transform the garden of Yggsgard: Royal Palace into a winter wonderland.

content.title: Craft your personalized winter greeting card
details: Complete missions to earn Golden and Silver Frost.
Unlock and upgrade a dazzling array of greeting card decorations.

content.title: Celebrate the season with themed costumes
details: Jeff the Land Shark - Cuddly Fuzzlefin (Free during the 'Winter Celebration' event)
Groot - Holiday Happiness (Available 2024/12/20 to 2025/01/10 UTC+0)
Rocket Raccoon - Wild Winter (Available 2024/12/20 to 2025/01/10 UTC+0)
Venom - Snow Symbiote (Available 2024/12/27 to 2025/01/17 UTC+0)
Magik - Frozen Demon (Available 2024/12/27 to 2025/01/17 UTC+0)

content.title: All Platforms—General
details: Fixed the Double-Elimination Tournament Display issue.
Resolved the Tournament Exit Glitch.
Fixed issues related to historical faction access after tournaments.
Squirrel Girl achievement now properly counts enemy KOs.
Partially resolved network stability issues under poor conditions.

content.title: Maps and Gameplay
details: Resolved character collision issues on some maps.
Corrected vehicle performance in special convoy missions.

content.title: Hero Bug Fixes
details: Doctor Strange's portal KOs are functioning correctly again.
Fixed Winter Soldier's movement speed issues after using his ultimate.
Rocket Raccoon's jet pack issues have been resolved.
Venom's 'Cyan Clash' emote texture corrected.
Star-Lord's low gravity glitch resolved.
Fixed terrain KO issues with Jeff the Land Shark's ultimate.

content.title: Memory Mastery
details: Optimized console memory management to prevent crashes.
